## getStack() function

Get the stack of tiles located at the given hex coordinate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getStack(board: GameBoard, coordinate: HexCoordinate): TileId[];
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

board


</td><td>

[GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)


</td><td>

A game board


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

coordinate


</td><td>

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)


</td><td>

A hex coordinate


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[TileId](./hive-lib.tileid.md)<!-- -->\[\]

The tile stack at the given coordinate.

## Remarks

If there is not stack at the given coordinate, an empty array is returned.
